about_the_game:
R00000 is a miniature experience of an amateur monster video shooting gone completely wrong. Look through the eyes of a troubled man seeking to film a scary picture at his own basement and plunge deeper and deeper into his mental prison with every new re-take.



Inspired by psychological problems such as Obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD), which can make life into everyday horror, R00000 makes the player obsessively re-shoot the same scene over and over again in order to perfect it. However, perfection comes with consequences in this dark and damp basement.



The stage upon which R00000 unfolds is made of 360° photographs taken at a real life OCD-inducing underground space. Wander through the actually existing corridors and witness the merging of the real and surreal. Will you ever stop re-shooting this scene? Will it ever stop nagging you? Will you be able to keep your posture and break free or succumb to the maddening voices in your head?



All of the answers and more are baked into a "Mini DVC" which takes up to 30 minutes to play-through. Yet one can always delete the footage and make just a one more take...

FEATURES


  • Unique player perspective - a liminal space recreated from real 360° photos
  • PS1 inspired graphics - a visual nod to 90’s VHS culture
  • Mysterious story - a short tale of light psychological horror
  • Puzzle infused gameplay - a riddle for your mind
  • Multiple endings - a possibility to choose your own fate
  • Achievements - 8 Steam achievements to uncover
  • Miniature yet dense experience - 20 to 30 min. of gameplay

ABOUT THE DEVELOPER


Weekend Warriors is a small and young independent games collective from Vilnius, Lithuania.

  • Game design - Povilas Vincentas Jankūnas
  • Programming - Karolis Dikčius
  • Sounds & Music - Ignas Čeponis

content_descriptors.notes:
- Depiction of psychological horror
- Depiction of hallucinations
- Depiction of Obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD) symptoms
- Depiction of curse words

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: R00000

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: A home brewed 360° interactive horror flick. Witness a troubled soul craving to make a chilling home movie realize that the monster lies a lot deeper than he could have ever guessed. Play the cassette and rewind the terror hidden inside.
